text: Agelak agak, Binɨb mɨñɨl mɨdebal ñɨn nab awl, tap si tap tɨmel gɨl, God nop kɨdek ma gɨpal agak. Anɨb apal, Tap olap ke ge nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨnɨgabun, Nak God wog ak geban agɨnɨgabun apal agak. Pen tap olap ke gen ma nɨgɨnɨgabal agak. Nɨgɨnɨg, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb Jona ne bɨlel gak, yad abe gen nɨgɨnɨgabal agak.
